title: Brand Ult Bug
body:
Alright, so this has been going on for a few days now, I checked the patch notes and in patch 6.1, there was a "bug fix" on Brand's ult.

MEN ON FIRE Fixed a bug where Pyroclasm would always prioritize enemy champions unless it killed its target

This is what happens to me in game. If an enemy champion is next to a minion, and only the enemy champion is ablaze, I ult the enemy champion, the ult won't bounce to the minion, even if they are directly next to each other, it just stops at the enemy champion. IDK if this is a bug or not, but it's dumb and should be fixed

replies.body:
Hey Pertsho - 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are working on a fix.
